# is-breadcrumb

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                          | Type                             | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `align`     | `align`     |                                                      | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`  | `undefined` |
| `separator` | `separator` | Use different separator for each item default is '/' | `"arrow" \| "dot" \| "slash"`    | `undefined` |
| `size`      | `size`      | Size of the breadcrumb, default set normal           | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `undefined` |
